Literature.Title: Potent and Specific Antibacterial Activity against Escherichia coli O157:H7 and Methicillin Resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) of G17 and G19 Peptides Encapsulated into Poly-Lactic-Co-Glycolic Acid (PLGA) Nanoparticles
Literature.Author: Gómez-Sequeda N, Ruiz J, Ortíz C, Urquiza M, Torres R

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC50=12.5µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC90=20µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MBC=70µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC50=1.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC90=6.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MBC=70µM)
